blocks.subject: FW: BRADDOCK-ITIN ONLY/$414.00 NON REF OR $1048.00 REFUNDABLE
Re: IMPORTANT-please read  Continental???    IMPORTANT-please read
raw_header: To: Dave Samuels/HOU/ECT@ECT, Julie Ferrara/HOU/ECT@ECT, Rahil
Jafry/HOU/ECT@ECT, Bob Shults/HOU/ECT@ECT, Louise Kitchen/HOU/ECT@ECT, David
text: I just spoke to Mark Taylor and he has requested that we be more specific
about the nature of the project we are working on in our confidentiality
agreements.  On a going forward basis can you please provide that information
along with the other info you give me.  Thanks!
I will be out of the office Monday and Tuesday.  If you have a RUSH
Confidentiality Agreement that can't wait until Wednesday, call Mark Taylor
at x37459 and he will find someone else in our Group to prepare it.
Louise, don't worry about Continental.  Mark is working on getting it signed
